Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2018 09:45AM Briannadawn wrote: hey there I had just been diagnosed about a month ago. I had done a lumpectomy but they said it spread into my lymph nodes and they want me to do a mastectomy plus take out ALL of my lymphs. I am now thinking of just taking the holistic route and fleeing to Mexico. Has anyone just through the lumoextomy and opted out for the other?? I am stage 3 ERPR + HER-
Posts.Title: I'm afraid of needles & need a masectomy! jacquibutterfly Momine
